description.en: Integration for Lyrion Music Server (formerly Logitech Media Server) supporting multiple Squeezebox and compatible players with synchronization.
description.de: Integration für Lyrion Music Server (früher Logitech Media Server) mit Unterstützung für mehrere Squeezebox und kompatible Player mit Synchronisation.
description.fr: Intégration pour Lyrion Music Server (anciennement Logitech Media Server) prenant en charge plusieurs lecteurs Squeezebox et compatibles avec synchronisation.

value.en:
This integration connects to your Lyrion Music Server (LMS) to control all your Squeezebox and compatible players.

You'll need:
• IP address of your LMS server
• LMS HTTP port (default: 9000)

All players connected to your LMS will be automatically discovered and available as separate media player entities with full playback control and multi-room synchronization.
